about_the_game:
Extreme Formula Championship is amazing 3D formula racing game for everyone. Do you Want to become a Championship, then show your desire to be a Formula Racing Champion.

Features
-HD Quality of Graphics used in the Game.
-There are 5 Different Tracks in the game. (Demo has access to Level 1)
-Excitement increases after every second.
-You can play each Track maximum upto 99 Laps.
-Both Keyboard and controller support provided.
-Multi-language support in the Game.
-20 Formula Racing Cars available in the game. (One car available in Demo Version)
-Fully Tested on Windows 7 & above.
-Ratings & Feedback Appreciated.
detailed_description:
Extreme Formula Championship is amazing 3D formula racing game for everyone. Do you Want to become a Championship, then show your desire to be a Formula Racing Champion.

Features
-HD Quality of Graphics used in the Game.
-There are 5 Different Tracks in the game. (Demo has access to Level 1)
-Excitement increases after every second.
-You can play each Track maximum upto 99 Laps.
-Both Keyboard and controller support provided.
-Multi-language support in the Game.
-20 Formula Racing Cars available in the game. (One car available in Demo Version)
-Fully Tested on Windows 7 & above.
-Ratings & Feedback Appreciated.
developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
name: Extreme Formula Championship Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later required
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: 512 MB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U
  • Graphics: 1 GB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
short_description: Extreme Formula Championship is amazing 3D formula racing game for everyone. Do you Want to become a Championship, then show your desire to be a Formula Racing Champion.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
